q: what does this video teach us
pred: The video teaches us the importance of proper foot care and the process of putting on and taking off ballet shoes. It shows the woman demonstrating the correct way to put on and take off ballet shoes, which can be helpful for those who are new to ballet or want to learn the proper technique. Additionally, the video highlights the importance of maintaining good foot hygiene and the need to clean the shoes regularly to ensure comfort and prevent any potential infections.
